title: dsc resource test result
description: Describes the return data for a DSC Resource instance from the `dsc resource get` command. The return data is either a single object that describes the tested state of a non-nested instance or an array of objects that describe the tested state of the nested instances for a group or adapter resource.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: dsc resource test result (simple)
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description:
Describes the return data for a single DSC Resource instance from the `dsc resource test` command. This data is returned for instances that aren't group resources, adapter resources, or nested inside a group or adapter resource.
When you use `dsc resource test` for a group or adapter resource, the command returns an array of full test result objects that include the name and type for the nested instances.

desiredState.title: Desired state
desiredState.description: This property always represents the desired state of the DSC Resource instance as specified to DSC.

actualState.title: Actual state
actualState.description: This property always represents the current state of the DSC Resource instance as returned by its `test` method or, if the DSC Resource doesn't define the `test` method, by its `get` method. DSC validates this return value against the DSC Resource's schema.

inDesiredState.title: Instance is in the desired state
inDesiredState.description: This property indicates whether the instance is in the desired state.

differingProperties.title: Differing properties
differingProperties.description: This property always represents the list of property names for the DSC Resource instance that aren't in the desired state. When this property is an empty array, the instance is in the desired state.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: dsc resource test result (full)
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description:
Describes the return data for the full result of the `test` operation for a
resource instance. This data is returned:

- For every instance in a configuration document when you use the
  `dsc config test` command.

- For nested instances of a group or adapter resource when you use the
  `dsc resource test` command.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: Instance name
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description: The short, human-readable name for a DSC Resource instance. Must be unique within a DSC Configuration document. Must be a non-empty string containing only letters, numbers, and spaces.

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: DSC Resource fully qualified type name
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description:
The namespaced name of the DSC Resource, using the syntax:

owner[.group][.area]/name

For example:

  - Microsoft.SqlServer/Database
  - Microsoft.SqlServer.Database/User

https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.title: dsc resource test result
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PowerS.description: Describes the return data for a DSC Resource instance from the `dsc resource get` command. The return data is either a single object that describes the tested state of a non-nested instance or an array of objects that describe the tested state of the nested instances for a group or adapter resource.
